nodes.text: Barbadelans were a sentient species that existed in the galaxy. Dobarn Tren and Karamu were members of this species.
The Barbadelan were a species of orange or tan colored skin.
Dobarn Tren, a male Barbadelan, served as a priest of the Sacred Way on the planet Corellia.
Karamu, a male Barbadelan, was a pilot who met Chewbacca and Han Solo on Barbadel.
